content.description:
The start moves to this problem make up the crux. 

  low or sit start under the inverted, shaded section of this boulder. feet on small edges, and with hands on smooth, angular holds. 

  Work up overhead to better holds which lead to a solid top out.
content.location: This is at Rhododendron Gap and almost out in the middle of the flat grassy expansion, closer to Rhodo Peak than anything else in the Feral Area... you will see a large "island" of rock surrounded by shrubs and rhododendron. Inspect around it and find the trail that runs across this island. Take it and find the rock face that is beside the trail. The problem runs up the shaded overhung face.

content.description: Secluded, steep, and out of the sun. Walk up the little pony path and into the "Alcove". The climbing here is fun and you'll no doubt be all by yourself.
